metadata.synopsis: A disembodied voice congratulates the player for reaching the entrance the inner sanctum of the Shar Temple. It urges the player too step into the water for their final test
metadata.how_to_trigger: Arrive at the entrannce to Nightsong's Prison

0.speaker: GROUP_SHA_VoiceOfShar
0.text: The end draws near. You show great potential - do not falter now.

2.speaker: GROUP_SHA_VoiceOfShar
2.text: One more test awaits. Descend to the Nightsong. Make a sacrifice. Rise again a Dark Justiciar.

1.speaker: GROUP_SHA_VoiceOfShar
1.text: You persevere, though you struggled in my trials. Admirable, perhaps.
